${modID}:General:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:General:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:General:DamageMagnify.NAME: Damage Magnify
${modID}:General:DamageMagnify.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Multiply its damage by !M! this combat. Exhaust.

${modID}:General:EnergyDiminish.NAME: Energy Diminish
${modID}:General:EnergyDiminish.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Halve its cost for this combat (round to even). NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:DamageIncrease.NAME: Damage Increase
${modID}:General:DamageIncrease.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand with damage. It gains !M! damage for this combat.

${modID}:General:BlockIncrease.NAME: Block Increase
${modID}:General:BlockIncrease.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand with Block. It gains !M! Block for this combat.

${modID}:General:EnergyDecrease.NAME: Energy Decrease
${modID}:General:EnergyDecrease.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

${modID}:General:BlockMagnify.NAME: Block Magnify
${modID}:General:BlockMagnify.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It gains !M!x Block for this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:HPShrink.NAME: HP Shrink
${modID}:General:HPShrink.DESCRIPTION: Set an enemy's HP to !M! of its current HP (round to even). NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:Execute.NAME: Execute
${modID}:General:Execute.DESCRIPTION: If the target has !M! %HP or less, kill it.

${modID}:General:TaiChi.NAME: Tai Chi
${modID}:General:TaiChi.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain !M! Block. Whenever you play a non-attack card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:General:Purify.NAME: Purify
${modID}:General:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs from an enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:General:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. Deal 50% of that damage to all other enemies.

${modID}:General:Splash.NAME: Splash
${modID}:General:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Gain Splash.Whenever you deal Attack damage, deal #b%d%% of that damage to all other enemies.

${modID}:General:Negate.NAME: Negate
${modID}:General:Negate.DESCRIPTION: Negate the target enemy's intent. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:WildCard.NAME: WildCard
${modID}:General:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your deck. This becomes a copy of it for the rest of this combat.

${modID}:General:Ramp.NAME: Ramp
${modID}:General:Ramp.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:LossAndOverflow.NAME: Loss and Overflow
${modID}:General:LossAndOverflow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, after you draw, gain Strength equal to !M! minus the total cost of cards in your hand (X is capped at !M!).

${modID}:General:ChaosOrb.NAME: Chaos Orb
${modID}:General:ChaosOrb.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, apply !M! random debuff to the target.

${modID}:General:DronePack.NAME: Drone Pack
${modID}:General:DronePack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb Slots. NL Channel !M! random orbs.

${modID}:General:ShowHand.NAME: Show Hand
${modID}:General:ShowHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Then for each card in your hand: discard a random card and deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:General:Fate.NAME: Fate
${modID}:General:Fate.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! random cards from the entire card pool. NL Exhaust.
